body_en: Later, the term took an important place in Russian political propaganda and is used with a negative connotation. Step by step, members of any power and law enforcement agencies of Ukraine began to be called "Banderites", regardless of their attitude towards nationalism. Such a uniform interpretation of history became the basis for accusing the authorities of supporting neo-Nazism and creating the image of an enemy.
